explanation: [0-0] A pair of hands holds a black rubber band, placing it over the handle of a white cup. There are blue borders at the top and bottom of the frame. There are subtitles at the top.

[0-2] The person uses the rubber band to connect the handle of the cup with the pointed edge of the cup's opening. They then pour the liquid inside simultaneously into three cups. The scene changes to a room where a young man in a white shirt and gray pants is pouring water in the same way, but the rubber band snaps, splashing water everywhere. There is a chandelier on the ceiling.

[2-7] The scene switches again. A person puts a chocolate egg into a cup filled with milk, and the chocolate melts, revealing a marshmallow inside. The scene cuts back to the young man in white, who puts a chocolate ball into a cup. He then pours milk from a pot into the cup and stirs it. Finally, he scoops out the marshmallow with a spoon and eats it.
